items.title: Hamas source says group agrees to latest Gaza ceasefire proposal
items.description: The proposal from regional mediators would see Israeli hostages released in two batches during a 60-day truce, according to a Palestinian official.

items.title: Key takeaways so far from Ukraine talks in Washington
items.description: Ukraine's President Zelensky managed to avoid another disastrous Oval Office meeting with Donald Trump.

items.title: What to know as Air Canada strike continues
items.description: Air Canada advises passengers not to go to the airport unless they have tickets on other airlines.

items.title: 'No-one was expecting this': European leaders rush to US to help Ukraine avoid 'capitulation'
items.description: The heads of state hope to stop Trump from threatening long-term European security, writes James Landale.
